Package csw.services.location.commons

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActorSystemFactory
    ActorSystemFactory creates a remote ActorSystem on the interface where csw-cluster is running.
    ActorSystemFactory$
    ActorSystemFactory creates a remote ActorSystem on the interface where csw-cluster is running.
    BlockingUtils
    Allows the caller to wait for a predicate to fulfill in a given time duration.
    BlockingUtils$
    Allows the caller to wait for a predicate to fulfill in a given time duration.
    ClusterAwareSettings
    ClusterAwareSettings represents ClusterSettings with default values.
    ClusterAwareSettings$
    ClusterAwareSettings represents ClusterSettings with default values.
    ClusterConfirmationActor  
    ClusterConfirmationActor.HasJoinedCluster$  
    ClusterConfirmationActor$  
    ClusterSettings
    ClusterSettings manages Config values required by an ActorSystem to boot.
    ClusterSettings$  
    Constants  
    Constants$  
    CswCluster
    CswCluster provides cluster properties to manage distributed data.
    CswCluster$
    Manages initialization and termination of ActorSystem and the Cluster.
    LocationServiceLogger
    All the logs generated from location service will have a fixed componentName, which is the value of Constants.LocationService.
    LocationServiceLogger$
    All the logs generated from location service will have a fixed componentName, which is the value of Constants.LocationService.
